name: Pyrite Heart
summary: When a feud with her brother gets too hot, Princess Ahri Remono, a young woman with a heart of fire, accepts a challenge that she cannot thrive in the world outside the Imperial Palace. In her first day in class, the boisterous princess finds a potential rival in the student body president.
info:
• 中文名: 帕莱特之心
  • 发行: Sekai Project
